readability-static-definition-in-anonymo.description:
Description

Finds static function and variable definitions in anonymous namespace.

In this case,
static
is redundant, because anonymous namespace limits the
visibility of definitions to a single translation unit.

namespace
{
static
int
a
=
1
;
// Warning.
static
const
int
b
=
1
;
// Warning.
namespace
inner
{
static
int
c
=
1
;
// Warning.
}
}

The check will apply a fix by removing the redundant
static
qualifier.
readability-static-definition-in-anonymo.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
